reqs:
If you wish to take the course but do not meet the restrictions, please DO NOT CONTACT THE INSTRUCTOR. You need to waitlist yourself and will find out if you will have assigned seat during the first week of classes or earlier.
Students who register in this waitlist section are not guaranteed registration in the course. Students will be accomodated into the course provided seats are available. Please check the SSC during the first week of classes to view the registration changes.

description: Legislation affecting the practice of engineering; ethical principles and responsibilities. Management of engineering enterprises; labour relations, safety and environmental legislation. Restricted to engineering undergraduate students in the final year of their program.
